Literature.Title: Isolation, Characterization and Mode of Action of a Plant-Derived Antifungal Peptide, Cc-AFP1 Against Aspergillus Fumigatus
Literature.Author: Seyedjavadi SS, Khani S, Goudarzi M, Beheshti S, Zare-Zardini H, Shams-Ghahfarokhi M, Jamzivar F, Razzaghi-Abyaneh M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:<5% Hemolysis=32 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:12.56% Hemolysis=128 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:5% Killing=32 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:10% Killing=128 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Aspergillus fumigatus Af293(MIC=8µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus Af293(MFC=16µg/ml),Aspergillus flavus PFCC 100(MIC=16µg/ml),Aspergillus flavus PFCC 100(MFC=32µg/ml),Aspergillus niger ATCC 9029(MIC=8µg/ml),Aspergillus niger ATCC 9029(MFC=8µg/ml)
